title: PassmanLite Wear Password
summary: The most complete password manager for Android and Smartwatch
description: Passman is a mobile phone password manager. Store your passwords and keep them organized. Now with the incredible  password explosion feature!Free version, limited to 6 records.Beside the 120 icons already included in the application, you can now use images and photos on the phone!Passman iscompatible with your Android SmartWatch. It automatically syncs all your passwords and can be used even if the watch is not connected to the mobile phone!Store unlimited passwords in the SQL Lite Database.AES 128-bit Encryption.Encrypted Backup and restore files.Inactivity timeout. Self-Destruction (the original!).Password generator and strength checker.
descriptionHTML:
Passman is a mobile phone password manager. Store your passwords and keep them organized. Now with the incredible password explosion feature!
Free version, limited to 6 records.

Beside the 120 icons already included in the application, you can now use images and photos on the phone!

Passman iscompatible with your Android SmartWatch. It automatically syncs all your passwords and can be used even if the watch is not connected to the mobile phone!

Store unlimited passwords in the SQL Lite Database.
AES 128-bit Encryption.
Encrypted Backup and restore files.
Inactivity timeout.
Self-Destruction (the original!).
Password generator and strength checker.
comments: Security is Bad If you copy a password it stays in the clipboard until you restart your phone or copy something new. The app never times out and if your not using a phone lock your password's are free to access.
Owncloud? Waiting for Syncronisation with the owncloud passman app.
Awesome app but only limited to 6 entries. My touch anroid
Only lets me have six entries then nothing but failure notifications samsung intercept
After adding 6 passwords it gives me a failed to write to database error. Also if you go back and edit the icon it erases the name.
recentChanges: - Improved User Interface for Android Wear
- New, password explosion feature. Watch the movie!!!!
- Bug fixes and optimizations for Hi-Resolution tablet displays
